summary: Defines a parameterized circuit template that realizes a CNOT (CX) gate using an RZX interaction flanked by single‑qubit Y‑ and X‑rotations (RY and RX). The template can be invoked by the Qiskit transpiler to replace CX with a native‑gate‑friendly decomposition.
business_intent: Enable hardware‑aware compilation by expressing CX in terms of the native RZX gate, thereby improving execution efficiency and fidelity on quantum processors that support RZX as a primitive two‑qubit operation.
